ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Least Powerful Class in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: that s a totally bogus poll anyway.  in groups?  solo?  fighting blues? fighting reds?  what level?  what kind of equipment? you get a different answer
ygData.messageBody:
that's a totally bogus poll anyway. in groups? solo? fighting blues?
fighting reds? what level? what kind of equipment?

you get a different answer depending on how you answer those
questions.


>Interesting perception about bard's on Allakhazam's poll:
>
>http://everquest.allakhazam.com/polls/everquest/poll.htm
>
>You can bypass voting if you want by just clicking on "View the Results". I
>don't mean to start a grip session. As a bard I consider us quite powerful,
>but then again, I'm level 38 and pretty much loving life as I'm able to do
>all the things a bard can, without just getting the "sing manasong only"
>too often.
>
>---Windleaf Mistsong
>
